title: @Riot I do not feel any sympathy for the people asking for Yasuo nerfs.
body:
There are so many champions in this game that have such an easy time kitting and whipping the floor with a team, that picking on a champion most players have not invested time to research, brings me not to care about anything they say. For the most part these people are requesting nerfs purely because they don't like playing against him. Not because he is toxic, not because he is broke, (He has a lower than 50% winrate), but because when they meet someone who invested his or her time into learning a champion and that person kills them, they get frustrated. They don't invest time to play Yasuo, very clear by his 13% play rate. They don't invest time to learn to counter him, of which I could link a 100 different Yasuo counter guilds. They don't invest time to learn which champions counter Yasuo, especially since he is just so easy to counter if you play well. 

Give me Brand, Ryze, and Talon on my team and it is almost a sure win. Their simple kits, combined with their over the top damage and utility just leaves them so over powered. But no one cries about them. I have literally 3v5ed as those three with my two m8s who play this game. They had never played the champions, and on their first try at them, they rekted. Now I love my mates, but they have gone 0/17 on champions such as garen, so they are learning and new. My point is there are so many champions in this game never addressed, which completely flatten yasuo. And I know someone will bring up, "but Yasuo's mobility, blah blah blah". Listen that is what stuns are for, that is what counters are for. There are two items to protect yasuo against them and neither are worth the money since Scimitar's cool down is high, but it only counters one crowd control spell, and not chained cc. If you are playing a champion who can not stun Yasuo, or put him in any form of cc, such as annie, brand, ryze, etc can, It means Yasuo is probably meant to kill your type of champion. I see adc crying all the time about his windwall and his ease at killing them, well guess what! He is your counter, the only one you have. Shocking right? What other move can block your long range attacks? Nothing. As for those crying about his shield, which gives him 200 extra life, if you can't poke his shield, don't engage, ta da. It's like I just discovered America for you. If you can't handle that shield, it probably is a stupid idea to engage him at that moment to begin with. In a trade off between poking, Yasuo will lose. Poke his shield, then poke him, chances are early game he won't do any damage to you, or not near as much as you will to him. He wont engage as agro after that. If you are stupid enough to stand near the minions to fight him, that is your fault. That is his kingdom, stay out of his range, poke him. 

I feel no sympathy for people who have no actual argument for the nerfs other than, he is op. He is annoying. He is unkillable. Yet they have never once look at a guide or invested in learning anything to outplay Yasuo. On top of that, only wood-silver ranked people are complaining about him.  Every gold+ ranked player who I have talked to, says they rek Yasuo. Why is that because they invested time into the game and got good at it, where they don't fear a mobile champion who is easily countered. Give me one reasonable argument to nerf a champion who is at a 50% win rate.

Both also scale extremely well into late game because of this fact. 

Tryndamere gets to go full AD because of his ultimate while Yasuo can go full AD because of the outplay potential his kit provides. The difference is that Yasuo is a skirmisher who is designed to be able to get to high priority targets like the ADC and kill them with ease (Fiora is a skirmisher too, but the problem with that champion is the fact she only needs two items then gets to build resistances and then gets to fight anyone she wants because of the true dmg her kit provides).
